text: Economically, it's more expensive to make movies. I hope digital movies change that.

text: In life, single women are the most vulnerable adults. In movies, they are given imaginary power.

text: When I was a little boy I used to borrow my father's hat, and make a press card to stick in the hat band. That was the way reporters were always portrayed in the movies.
